statements: SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data
SELECT vehicle_id, miles_driven, fuel_amount, date FROM fuel_consumption_data
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_amount, date, miles_driven FROM fuel_consumption_data
SELECT date, fuel_amount, miles_driven, vehicle_id FROM fuel_consumption_data
SELECT fuel_amount, miles_driven, date, vehicle_id FROM fuel_consumption_data
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT vehicle_id, date, fuel_amount FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE miles_driven > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(fuel_amount) AS avg_fuel_consumption FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING avg_fuel_consumption > 50;
SELECT SUM(fuel_amount) AS total_fuel_consumed FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, MIN(fuel_amount) AS min_fuel_consumption, MAX(fuel_amount) AS max_fuel_consumption FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_type FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_logs WHERE fuel_cost > 50;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_quantity FROM vehicles JOIN fuel_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = fuel_logs.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_type='Diesel';
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_logs WHERE fuel_quantity > 50 ORDER BY fuel_date ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, fuel_quantity, fuel_cost FROM vehicles JOIN fuel_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = fuel_logs.vehicle_id WHERE fuel_cost < 50;
SELECT vehicle_name, SUM(fuel_quantity) AS total_fuel FROM vehicles JOIN fuel_logs ON vehicles.vehicle_id = fuel_logs.vehicle_id GROUP BY vehicle_name HAVING total_fuel > 100;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles;
SELECT location, station_name FROM fuel_stations;
SELECT fuel_amount, fuel_price FROM fuel_entries;
SELECT entry_id, vehicle_id, entry_date FROM fuel_entries;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND fuel_type = 'Gasoline';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50 ORDER BY vehicle_make;
SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, f.entry_date, f.fuel_amount FROM vehicles v JOIN fuel_entries f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.fuel_amount > 20 ORDER BY f.entry_date DESC;
SELECT fs.station_name, COUNT(fe.entry_id) AS total_entries FROM fuel_stations fs LEFT JOIN fuel_entries fe ON fs.station_id = fe.station_id GROUP BY fs.station_name HAVING total_entries > 5;

SELECT v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, SUM(fe.fuel_amount) AS total_fuel FROM vehicles v JOIN fuel_entries fe ON v.vehicle_id = fe.vehicle_id GROUP BY v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model ORDER BY total_fuel DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data;
SELECT fuel_type, fuel_quantity, fuel_cost FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_year < 2015;
SELECT driver_name, driver_license_no FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 3;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM fuel_stations WHERE station_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_cost > 50 ORDER BY fuel_quantity DESC, fuel_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, fuel_type, SUM(fuel_quantity) AS total_fuel FROM fuel_consumption_data GROUP BY vehicle_id, fuel_type HAVING total_fuel > 500 ORDER BY total_fuel DESC;

SELECT d.driver_name, v.vehicle_make, v.vehicle_model, f.fuel_quantity, f.fuel_cost FROM drivers d JOIN vehicles v ON d.driver_id = v.vehicle_id JOIN fuel_consumption_data f ON v.vehicle_id = f.vehicle_id WHERE f.fuel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT s.station_name, s.station_location, COUNT(f.fuel_quantity) AS total_transactions FROM fuel_stations s LEFT JOIN fuel_consumption_data f ON s.station_id = f.vehicle_id GROUP BY s.station_name, s.station_location ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE fuel_type IN ('Petrol', 'Diesel') AND fuel_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY fuel_cost ASC, fuel_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles;
SELECT log_date, fuel_amount FROM fuel_logs;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM fuel_stations;
SELECT fuel_type_id, fuel_type FROM fuel_types;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicles WHERE fuel_capacity > 50;
SELECT log_date, fuel_amount FROM fuel_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT station_name, station_location FROM fuel_stations WHERE station_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, fuel_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
